                           Resources res)
                                    throws nde2.errors.InvalidParameterException,
                                           java.io.IOException,
                                           XmlPullParserException,
                                           nde2.errors.NDE2Exception
        Generates a summary of economic data for the supplied area.
        Throws:
        nde2.errors.InvalidParameterException
        java.io.IOException
        XmlPullParserException
        nde2.errors.NDE2Exception
        Parameters:
        area - The area to query.
        res - Used to build the text on the card.
        Returns:
        A card with the summary of the economic activity within the area.

      • getUnemploymentRate

        public static TrendDescription getUnemploymentRate(nde2.pull.types.Area area)
                                            throws XmlPullParserException,
                                                   java.io.IOException,
                                                   nde2.errors.NDE2Exception
        Gets the unemployment figure for the given area. While unemployment may not be the best indicator of the economic health of an area, it is the most up-to-date one on the system.
        Throws:
        XmlPullParserException
        java.io.IOException
        nde2.errors.NDE2Exception
        Parameters:
        area - the area to find unemployment for.
        Returns:
        Trend Description of the unemployment rate.
